Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable

    public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collidable
    Weapon Class that represents a weapon a Player can use (In the Future Enemy Class may use it too)
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    srikrishna + kinjal(damage and collision detection)

      Weapon()
      Default Constructor that creates Weapon Object

      represents the Weapon Object graphically using the Graphics object for the pixel grid it refers to

      Returns weapon damage (currently not in use)
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double getHitbox()
      gets hitbox to use for collision detection
      boolean isSwinging()

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 double x,
                 double y,
                 boolean up,
                 boolean down,
                 boolean left,
                 boolean right,
                 java.awt.Image img)
        represents the Weapon Object graphically using the Graphics object for the pixel grid it refers to
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object connected to the pixel grid you wish to draw this object on
        x - X coordinate you wish to draw this Weapon Object
        y - Y coordinate you wish to draw this Weapon Object
